The Iran Weather Map below shows the weather forecast for the next 10 days. Control the animation using the slide bar found beneath the weather map. Select from the other forecast maps (on the right) to view the temperature, cloud cover, wind and precipitation for this country on a large scale with animation. You can also get the latest temperature, weather and wind observations from actual weather stations under the live weather section.
